hooks.name: Auto-format Python files
hooks.description: Runs ruff format + ruff check --fix on Python files after Write or Edit

hooks.name: Auto-test on test file change
hooks.description: Runs pytest on the changed test file after Write or Edit

hooks.name: Block destructive commands
hooks.description: Prevents rm -rf, force push to main, sudo, and pipe-to-bash
hooks.command: INPUT=$(cat); CMD=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r '.tool_input.command // empty'); if echo "$CMD" | grep -qE '(rm\s+-rf\s+/|rm\s+-rf\s+~|sudo\s|git\s+push\s+--force\s+(origin\s+)?main|git\s+push\s+-f\s+(origin\s+)?main|git\s+reset\s+--hard|curl.*\|\s*bash|wget.*\|\s*bash)'; then echo "BLOCKED: Destructive command detected: $CMD" >&2; exit 2; fi
